message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe it's worth more than what others have paid, but considering your specific interest and needs, I'm willing to extend this exclusive opportunity to you. I propose a price of $95 for the product. This way, you're getting a great deal, and I'm able to appreciate its value as well. What do you think?
